comments:
Not sure if UI is the correct place for this but....
I upgraded to CDT 3.0 RC3 yesterday and the outline view is no longer working. I
see about half my includes and no other information. 

Version: 3.1.0
Build id: I20050627-1435
Slackware Linux 10.0

All my projects are standard make projects and I use GNU autotools for building
my projects.

I only saw one entry in the error log about the CDT, it is not recurring and
only happened on one restart since I installed 3.0 RC3. I doubt it is relevent
but I am including it anyway.
